title: Man's Shirt (Poncho)
description: rust plain weave; narrow 5\" bands hand laced together; horizontal sleeve bands, 19-1/2\", each side; round head opening; front slit, 4\" male opening; sleeves and lower edge hand-hemmed; head and male openings lined
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
